snippet: Brook Lopez made a basket with 0.4 of a second left in overtime to clinch the Nets’ fifth win in a row over the Nuggets.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Brooklyn Nets beat Denver Nuggets, 121-120; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Brook Lopez made a basket with 0.4 of a second left in overtime to clinch the Nets’ fifth win in a row over the Nuggets.

headline.print_headline: Nets Rally to Beat Nuggets in Overtime
headline.main: Nets Rally to Beat Nuggets in Overtime
